recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM OPINION re: 74 MOTION to Dismiss filed by Nick Longo, 63 MOTION to Dismiss filed by Keegan McNamara, 82 MOTION to Dismiss filed by Jonah Bennet, 50 MOTION to Dismiss filed by Ephrat Livni, Andrew Ross Sorkin, New York Times Company, 54 MOTION to Dismiss filed by Arkham Intelligence, Inc., Zachary Lerangis, Miguel Morel. The Court has considered all of the arguments of the parties. For the foregoingreasons, the motions of the Times Defendants, the Arkham Defendants, McNamara, and Bennett to dismiss the complaint for failure to state a claim upon which relief may be granted (Dkts 50, 54, 63, 74, 82) all are granted and the case dismissed. To the extent that certain defendants moved also to dismiss for lack of personal jurisdiction, those motions are denied as moot in light of the disposition of the case on other grounds. The Clerk shall close the case. SO ORDERED. (Signed by Judge Lewis A. Kaplan on 11/13/2023) (vfr) Transmission to Orders and Judgments Clerk for processing. (Entered: 11/13/2023)
